metadata.title: CVE-2024-23342 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The `ecdsa` PyPI package is a pure Python implementation of ECC (EllipticCurve Cryptography) with support for ECDSA (Elliptic Curve DigitalSignature Algorithm), EdDSA (Edwards-curve Digital Signature Algorithm) andECDH (Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman). Versions 0.18.0 and prior arevulnerable to the Minerva attack. As of time of publication, no knownpatched version exists.

criterions.comment: python-ecdsa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
